antgame.core

Class Ant

  • java.lang.Object
    • antgame.core.Ant

  • public class Ant
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a game ant.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ant(int id, Colony colony, World world, Cell cell)
      Creates a new ant belonging to the specified colony.

    • Method Summary

      void pickUp()
      Carries out a pick up instruction.
      void step()
      Performs a game step, with this ant performing a particular action based on the ant's brain state.
      int successfulMovements() 
      boolean surrounded()
      Checks if this ant is surrounded by five or more enemy ants.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ant

        public Ant(int id,
           Colony colony,
           World world,
           Cell cell)
        Creates a new ant belonging to the specified colony. The ant places itself in the given cell, that is, no 'manual' adding of this ant instance to a cell is required.
        Parameters:
        id - the ant's unique identifier
        colony - the colony to which the ant belongs
        world - the world in which this ant lives
        cell - the initial cell to place the ant in

    • Method Detail

      • getID

        public int getID()
        Returns:
        the unique identifier of this ant

      • surrounded

        public boolean surrounded()
        Checks if this ant is surrounded by five or more enemy ants.
        Returns:
        true if the ant is surrounded, otherwise false

      • step

        public void step()
        Performs a game step, with this ant performing a particular action based on the ant's brain state.

      • pickUp

        public void pickUp()
        Carries out a pick up instruction.

      • getColony

        public Colony getColony()
        Returns:
        the colony of the ant

      • hasFood

        public boolean hasFood()
        Returns:
        true if the ant is carrying anything, otherwise false

      • getCell

        public Cell getCell()
        Returns:
        where this ant is
